Package org.forgerock.openam.ldap

Class LDAPRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.ldap.LDAPRequests
  • public final class LDAPRequests
extends Object
    Wrapper around DJ SDK Requests static factory methods to add audit transaction id propagation and any other common features. This class should be used in preference to the raw DJ SDK class wherever possible.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.requests.AddRequest newAddRequest​(String name)
      Creates an LDAP add request that will propagate the common audit transaction id if the target LDAP server supports it (i.e., is OpenDJ).

      • newSimpleBindRequest

        public static org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.requests.SimpleBindRequest newSimpleBindRequest​(String name,
                                                                                        char[] password)
        Creates a simple LDAP bind request that will propagate the common audit transaction id if the target LDAP server supports it (i.e., is OpenDJ).
        Parameters:
        name - the user DN.
        password - the password.
        Returns:
        the bind request.
        See Also:
        Requests.newSimpleBindRequest(String, char[])
